name: FOLLOWED: Arath
description:
There's Something Strange going on in the mysterious city of Arath. You're just a normal man, trying to get by, but something is hunting you. You don't know what to do about it, just try to get to work (which is to the right of spawn by the way), and if you think someone is following you, run.

Hello! This is my submission to the Dev Squad Summer Game Jam. I hope you enjoy it!
